website_summaries.verdict: Keeps fluid cold while being engineered for rapid hydration.
pros: Holds half a gallon of water in a streamlined and streamlined jug
Good reviews in terms of the product's insulation
No need to freeze the jug before adding ice
Works great for sports or long days on a demanding job
cons: May leak around the mouthpiece if not secured tightly

customer_reviews.title: not well thought out.
customer_reviews.text: Great design aesthetically, but in practical terms, it doesn't function well. Yes, there is a lock which I like, but when you take a sip of water, there is a little bit that stays in the indentation, and when you go to carry it, the little bit of water spills. I'd say it's about an eighth of an ounce, which isn't much, but is annoying if you use for an indoor environment like an office. Finally, get prepared to get squirted in the eye with your drink when you press the release.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great jug
customer_reviews.text: The Powerade Pro Jug Bottle 64oz had worked extremely well for me. It only spills water if you drink from it with the drinking spout in some position other than the 6 O'clock position. Otherwise it seals well. The ergonomics are great, it keeps water cool for quite a while. A great way to ensure I get my required water intake for the day.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports camps and tournaments
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water cold and big enough to last all day in the sun. No problems with quality. We hand-wash the base and put the lid in the dishwasher with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: D. D.

customer_reviews.title: These don't leak like the popular brand all the kids have at the ...
customer_reviews.text: These don't leak like the popular brand all the kids have at the ball fields. And there was still ice in it after 6 hours in the Houston August heat.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hard working individuals. Pop some ice and you'll be refreshed all day.
customer_reviews.author: Student Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated bottle
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for any sport. My kids use it for all their practices and games.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but it leaks. After soccer, put in back of car and the floor was soaking with leaked water. Tried to tighten, still leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working well and large enough for 3 hours on the pickle ball court. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got a great deal on this and hubby LOVES it! It is super durable and is HUGE. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: KayMort

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Keeps my water cold all day
customer_reviews.text: I umpire Men's Competitive Softball and I use this quite alot. Great product. Keeps my water cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Billy

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cheaply made product. I have washed it again and again, but it still gives a very strong rubber odor. I’m sending it to trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Lisuya

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Holds plenty of liquid and keeps it cool for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it everyday. Drink 2 of these and I have my water quota for the day :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Sending it back. Very poorly designed. It leaks water where the mouth is. The plastic is seamed together there instead of being one solid piece. It's also very heavy without any water in it. Also, the handle is just a floppy piece of rubber. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Stay hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and color of the jug. Had many complements on the jug. I mostly use it for water because I like to stay hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great water jug
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water jug. When I bought this jug I wanted something that didn't leak and that is exactly what I got
customer_reviews.author: Fireman86

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have somewhat big water needs on gym.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient, but it serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy and “complicated” for young kids. My son calls it a weapon, but it serves the purpose
customer_reviews.author: Peggy V.

customer_reviews.title: Product failure
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product until it broke two months later. See photo. With just normal use, the handle hinge pin snapped. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: My son Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is big but very useful Bought it for my son, he is happy with it and used it daily
customer_reviews.author: Maria de la Torre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I am bring it anywhere i go. Gym, work, or even nust going to the park.
customer_reviews.author: RafaelTomagan

customer_reviews.title: my favorite thing is that it does not leak
customer_reviews.text: Everything you want it to do. my favorite thing is that it does not leak
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's no Yeti. But this does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT JUG
customer_reviews.text: Completely LOVE this jug. I somehow lost my first one. No spills or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it leaks every now and then through the clear plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Every time i push the button to drink from it ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time i push the button to drink from it, it shoots me in the face with water from inside the drinking uhh tube? Whatever you want to call it.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Leaks...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and had to return it due to the mouth piece leaking. The second one arrived and it does the same thing. I returned them both. Pretty disappointed. It seems like a bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sports bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sports bottle! The only complaint is that it is difficult to get the lid off. If you have small hands, it will be difficult to turn to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it at first until it started leaking when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed it at first until it started leaking when I drank from it all of a sudden idk why it’s doing that now. It wasn’t doing it before I bought it,so I’m wondering if over time this happens,because I’ve never dropped it! I don’t trip because it’s my workout jug,and the water leaking from it is like a cool relief,but it can be annoying
customer_reviews.author: Seantel

customer_reviews.title: Good product works well sturdy af
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. Stands about a foot tall and probably six inches wide. Two different carrying options, a little hook or a handle. Originally I gave it three stars because it was leaking but it actually wasn't leaking I just didn't have the mouthpiece fully pulled back the times it had leaked. You'll see what I mean when you get it lol just a dumb mistake but definitely a great water jug. Has a lock function to stay closed when you're not using it. Seems pretty heavy duty but I haven't smashed it on the pavement yet... with time we'll see if it can handle how terrible I am at holding onto items.... 😂
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s very big n can hold a lot. Not suitable to carry daily to an office
customer_reviews.author: ceodeo

customer_reviews.title: but its super annoying. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. UPDATE : I came back from a four day long vacation to find that the inside had eroded into a black sludge in my water. Never put a single acidic drink in it, just water. It was DISGUSTING, and I was lucky I looked in the container before just taking a drink.Same as what others say. Lid flings water when its opened, and there is ALWAYS some spilling out when trying to drink from a design flaw when you tip it. Its a bummer, because this was exactly what I was looking for. but its super annoying. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to receive (-1 star). Product is great tho!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, locking cap no spills, keeps cool all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I only received one. Packaging said it was a 2 pack. Where is the second bottle?
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of the bottle but it came in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the bottle but it came in broken out of the box now I gotta go through a whole process of returning it and buying a new one what a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Powerade Pro Jug Bottle
product_meta.description: The 64oz POWERADE Pro Jug is a high-quality sports bottle equipped with a spill-proof valve and lockable drink spout powerade by AUTOSEAL technology. The covered drink spout stays protected from dirt and opens with the push of a button. Featuring an integrated handle and fence hook, this rugged bottle with a high flow rate spout allows you to hydrate quickly while on the go. Fill up with POWERADE powdered sports drink or liquid drops mixed with water and ice for an environmentally conscious way to rehydrate to your maximum performance. No plastic odors or taste because this 64oz water bottle is made out of FDA-approved, BPA-free plastic.
feature_bullets: Auto spout technology with spill-proof valve and lockable drink spout
Covered drink spout stays protected from dirt and opens with the push of a button
Equipped with a high flow rate so you can hydrate quickly and on the go
Integrated carry handle and fence hook
Keeps beverages cold for up to 10 hours
